      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Well.decline(Creature creature)
      Shift from well to sick
      void Sick.decline(Creature creature)
      Shift from sick to dying

      void Dead.decline(Creature creature)
      State shift not valid
      void Sick.recover(Creature creature)
      Shift from sick to well

      shift from dying to sick

      State shift not valid
